column4: I'm buying a second pc with 60mb of ram and a P2, I want to set it up as a server
what other kind of hardward do I need?
do I need a hub or something?
um, not for the computer.  Yeah, you'll want a router, probably.
it'll go wall - cable modem - router - (both computers, separately)
do I need a special linux capabale router?
nah, packets are all the same.
I want to put apache on it and an IRC shell (screen + irssi)
and its just for personal use?
I'm sure policies will be reviewed because of this
happened right after dapper was released
